      • getMergedIntervalContainingInstant

        public static LocalDateTimeInterval getMergedIntervalContainingInstant​(java.util.Collection<LocalDateTimeInterval> intervals,
                                                                       java.time.LocalDateTime instant)
                                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        intervals - list of LocalDateTimeInterval
        instant - not null
        Returns:
        a LocalDateTimeInterval object representing the biggest continuous period containing the given LocalDate day & with each day of the interval contained into at least one of the given intervals returns null if there is no given intervals.

        Or null if the given instant is before the startDateT of the firstInterval or after the endDateT of the lastInterval.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given LocalDate is null

      • getLastOccurrence

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getLastOccurrence​(java.time.DayOfWeek occurrenceDayOfWeek,
                                                        java.time.LocalTime occurrenceTime,
                                                        java.time.LocalDateTime referenceDateT)
        Parameters:
        occurrenceDayOfWeek - : expected dayOfWeek of the result
        occurrenceTime - : expected time of the result
        referenceDateT - : date from which the result is searched
        Returns:
        the last date (inclusive) before given referenceDate having same dayOfWeek & same time as occurrences named parameters.

      • getNextOccurrence

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getNextOccurrence​(java.time.DayOfWeek occurrenceDayOfWeek,
                                                        java.time.LocalTime occurrenceTime,
                                                        java.time.LocalDateTime referenceDateT)
        Parameters:
        occurrenceDayOfWeek - : expected dayOfWeek of the result
        occurrenceTime - : expected time of the result
        referenceDateT - : date from which the result is searched
        Returns:
        the next date (inclusive) from given referenceDate having same dayOfWeek & same time as occurrences named parameters.

      • getNearestOccurrence

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getNearestOccurrence​(java.time.DayOfWeek occurrenceDayOfWeek,
                                                           java.time.LocalTime occurrenceTime,
                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime referenceDateT)
        In case of having the last & the next occurrences at exact same time distance, the next occurrence is returned (to mimic rounding in Math).
        Parameters:
        occurrenceDayOfWeek - : expected dayOfWeek of the result
        occurrenceTime - : expected time of the result
        referenceDateT - : date from which the result is searched
        Returns:
        the nearest date (inclusive) from given referenceDate having same dayOfWeek & same time as occurrences named parameters.

      • getLastMonthOccurrenceBoundaries

        public static MonthBoundaries getLastMonthOccurrenceBoundaries​(java.time.Month targetMonth,
                                                               java.time.LocalDateTime referenceDateTime)
        Parameters:
        targetMonth - : given java.time.Month to search boundaries on
        referenceDateTime - : date from which the result is searched
        Returns:
        a MonthBoundaries object containing the start date and the end date of the first month in the past from the @param referenceDateTime exclusive corresponding to the given @param targetMonth

      • getNextMonthOccurrenceBoundaries

        public static MonthBoundaries getNextMonthOccurrenceBoundaries​(java.time.Month targetMonth,
                                                               java.time.LocalDateTime referenceDateTime)
        Parameters:
        targetMonth - : given java.time.Month to search boundaries on
        referenceDateTime - : date from which the result is searched
        Returns:
        a MonthBoundaries object containing the start date and the end date of the first month in the future from the @param referenceDateTime exclusive corresponding to the given @param targetMonth
